title: Introduction of the image tag
description: The addition of the image tag to web pages was a controversial move that revolutionized the internet. Despite opposition due to concerns about network optimization and content quality, the image tag opened the door to a more graphical web, paving the way for the inclusion of images, videos, animations, and games on websites.
